snippet: Samsung said its newest Android smartphone, the Galaxy S III, would come out this month on all of the big carriers in the United States: Verizon, AT&T, Sprint and T-Mobile USA.
abstract: Samsung said its newest Android smartphone, the Galaxy S III, would come out this month on all of the big carriers in the United States: Verizon, AT&T, Sprint and T-Mobile USA.

headline.main: Samsung Plans Carrier Blitz for New Galaxy Phone
